RegionTable.ariaLabel: Table of websites cumulated by region and sorted by Barrierelos-Score

Overview.webpageWeightTooltip: Determines the influence of this webpage on the website score. The weight is based on the number of HTML elements on the webpage that are relevant for Accessibility.
